requirements.summary: Remove transparency from all dropdown/select lists throughout the application by ensuring all Select, Popover, DropdownMenu, and similar overlay components have fully opaque backgrounds
acceptanceCriteria: All dropdown/select lists render with a fully opaque background â€” no see-through or semi-transparent effect.

The fix applies consistently across all pages: ReportsListPage, MonthYearSelector, ApprovalsPage, DashboardPage, ActivityFormPage, ReportFormPage, UserManagementPage, and any other page with dropdowns.
The opaque background works correctly in both light and dark themes.
No other UI elements are affected by this change.

file_operations.description: Update CSS custom properties or add global override rules to ensure all dropdown/popover content (SelectContent, PopoverContent, DropdownMenuContent) renders with fully opaque backgrounds. Set background-opacity to 1.0 or add backdrop-filter: none to remove any transparency effects. Ensure the changes work in both light and dark themes by targeting the appropriate CSS variables or class selectors used by shadcn/ui components.

If transparency is coming from Tailwind theme configuration (e.g., OKLCH alpha channel in popover/dropdown color variables), update the relevant color definitions to ensure full opacity (alpha = 1). Review the custom theme tokens for popover, dropdown, or overlay-related colors and ensure they are defined without transparency.
